cells.data:
## WHERE
Return rows where sting pattern matches
```sql
SELECT * from flights
  WHERE origin LIKE '%a%';
```

## Agreggator functions

### COUNT
```sql
SELECT COUNT(*) from flights
  WHERE origin LIKE '%a%';
```
returns 
```
+---------+
| count   |
|---------|
| 3       |
+---------+
```

### SUM
```sql
SELECT SUM(duration) from flights
  WHERE origin LIKE '%a%';
```

### MIN 
```sql
SELECT MIN(duration) from flights
  WHERE origin LIKE '%a%';
```

### MAX
```sql
SELECT MAX(duration) from flights
  WHERE origin LIKE '%a%';
```

### AVG
```sql
SELECT AVG(duration) from flights
  WHERE origin LIKE '%a%';
```
